channel.title: Npc drops

item.title: Npc drops
item.dc:creator: @Kindler Kindler
item.description:
@Kindler wrote:

how can i make npcs drop 1m instead of 1gp? i got it like this in item2.java

[code]
}

public static int Dagannoth1[] = { 995, 995, 995, 995, 995, 995, 995, 995, 995, 995, 995, 995, 15350, 15334, 15195, 773, 995};
public static int randomDagannoth1() {
    return Dagannoth1[(int) (Math.random() * Dagannoth1.length)];
}

public static int Dagannoth2[] = { 15347, 995, 995, 995, 995, 995, 995, 995, 995, 995, 995, 995, 995, 995, 995, 774, 15336};
public static int randomDagannoth2() {
    return Dagannoth2[(int) (Math.random() * Dagannoth2.length)];
}

public static int Dagannoth3[] = { 15347, 995, 995, 995, 995, 995, 995, 995, 995, 995, 995, 995, 6818, 6859, 15352, 995, 15336};
public static int randomDagannoth3() {
    return Dagannoth3[(int) (Math.random() * Dagannoth3.length)];
}

public static int Dagannoth4[] = { 15347, 7462, 4716, 4718, 4720, 4722, 995, 995, 995, 995, 995, 995, 6818, 6859, 15352, 995, 15336};
public static int randomDagannoth4() {
    return Dagannoth4[(int) (Math.random() * Dagannoth4.length)];[/code]
